nodes.text: Tong was a male Zabrak sergeant in the Republic Army who served during the Galactic War with the Sith Empire. Stationed on the planet Balmorra, he and his team were called to the Balmorran Arms Factory to transport a cache of enemy weapons recovered from Hazard Vault 451 by Havoc Squad.
Sergeant Tong appears as part of the Trooper class mission "Den of Thieves" on Balmorra in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, which was released in 2011.
